title: The Secret love of Sandra Blain
creator_credit: Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors and Jim Tartan
brief_description: The step by step progression into alcoholism of a wife and mother is shown as Sandra Blain deceives her friends, family, physician and herself. The film focuses attention on the facilities and treatments available for the successful treatment and recovery of victims of the disease of alcoholism.
